entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
